long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doubtnut Chrome Extension – Best Edu Extension

Doubtnut.com has launched a chrome browser extension that is custom made to suit the learning needs of students preparing for class 6 to 12, CBSE and other state board exams, CBSE, NEET, IIT JEE and other various competitive exams. With millions of video & text solutions, the Doubtnut extension gives you a direct channel to clear your doubts while studying or browsing online.

How Doubtnut Chrome Extension Works:

It is a simple yet very effective tool to resolve your doubt while reading or studying on the internet.
 
1. 	Whenever you encounter any doubts, you just need to highlight the text and click right click to search the same on Doubtnut and find solutions in self-explanatory video solutions or simple text solutions.
2. 	Also, by clicking on the Doubtnut extension icon from the browser extension tray, you can upload an image of any question through the extension to get your doubt cleared in no time.

Features and Benefits of Doubtnut Chrome Extension:

·  	The extension is multi-linguistic, which means the students, from various parts of India, can freely enjoy the learning experience in their native language.
 
·  	After installing the Doubnut chrome extension, students have to highlight the question and right-click on it to access the option of Search through Doubtnut in a drop-down menu. When a student clicks on the Doubtnut option, he or she will receive the instant video solution for their respective doubt question.
 
·  	All the video solutions are presented in a step-by-step way so that even a naïve learner can easily understand the concepts involved when cracking the complex concepts.

About Doubtnut and Latest Chrome Extension:

After being a partner in the success of millions of students across India through its website and app, Doubtnut.com, one of the most liked online tutorial platform, launches a chrome extension to help students in resolving their doubts instantly. True to its name, Doubtnut extension allows the students of class 6 to 12, and IIT JEE, NEET aspirants to instantly clear any sort of doubts occurring during the study process.
 
Our platform, Doubtnut, in all ways helps the students in acing both the board exams like CBSE, ICSE, State boards etc. as well as the competitive exams like IIT JEE, NEET and various other state entrance exams.
 
As it is a proven fact that the visual aid, along with audio representations are better to understand a topic. Therefore, the solutions are presented in video format that increases the concentration among the students during the study time. This has made our platform stand out amongst the premium online tutorial platforms in India!
 
 Students can easily clear their doubts by the team of talented subject matter experts at any time by just posting the picture of the doubts on our online portal, Doubtnut.com.  The methodically solved problems presented by an expert teacher through the pre-recorded videos ensure the students don’t have to fret anymore during the examination time.
